content: autumn sunflower granny square pillow pattern *****this pattern is available for free on my website at https //www nautikrallcrochet com/blog-freepatterns/autumnsunflowerpillow this listing is for those who wish to have an advertisement free pattern or printable copy there s been an obvious shift in pattern sales in my shops lately as much as i m still in summer mode i can see that a lot of you are thinking about the upcoming change in seasons and christmas i m not quite there yet but i do love a good sunflower sunflowers scream late summer early autumn for me and i wanted to make myself a late-summer-inspired pillow in my favourite yarn wool of the andes tweed from wecrochet has done it again it took my ordinary sunflower square and turned it into a stunning rustic warm looking pillow that will transition beautifully into autumn i couldn t even stop at one i had to make a few of the colours before stopping myself hopefully you feel as inspired but these sweet little pillows as i do happy crocheting everyone this pattern is worked up using a starburst sunflower granny square the pattern uses wecrochet wool of the andes tweed 110yds/50g and a 5 00mm hook the final pillow size is 14 x14 patterns will include - yarn amounts/quantities - yarn colours/colour legends - stitch glossary - printable pdf - full colour chart of all squares and their positioning so you can make this exact colour copies - full written instruction for the granny square used starburst sunflower - video tutorials for the granny square continuous join as you go cjayg method of joining panel as well as how to seam the pillow shut happy crocheting everyone l m
